amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used by the Secretary of the Treasury to negotiate any agreement in contravention of specified statutorily enacted provisions contained in the 2009 Supplemental Appropriations Act (Public Law 111-32).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 111-193 to prohibit funds in the bill from being used by the Secretary of the Treasury to negotiate an agreement in contravention of certain provisions of law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kirk amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 429 - 2 (Roll no. 521).
